import React from "react"; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from "react"; import { useGetProductDetailsQuery } from "../slices/productsApiSlices"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from "../components/Message"; const ProductScreen = () => { const {id:productId} = useParams(); //cart state const {qty,setQty} = useState const{data:product,isLoading,error}=useGetProductDetailsQuery(productId); return (
Go Back { isLoading?():error?({error.error}):( <>

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price ${product.price} Status ${product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out of stock'} ) }
) } export default ProductScreen;
